intro: Flexularia, commonly known as the silver vine or spider plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Commelinaceae. Flexularia species are native to tropical and subtropical regions of the Americas and are popular as ornamental plants due to their aesthetic appeal and ease of care. They produce small, inconspicuous flowers that are often followed by capsules containing numerous seeds.
